reviews.review_msg: Very knowledgeable professor and great at teaching, the only tough part about this course is the amount of work given to you, expect to study more than usual. His slides and presentations were extremely clear. Very easy to talk to and to ask questions, highly recommend him if you plan on taking easc201.

James is a great professor with clear expectations. He puts a great deal of detail into lectures so take keen notes and review them post lecture. The tests are hard and compare/contrast details are important. I had online lectures which were pretty dry, but when James spoke in person at the lab he was not dry at all.

James is extremely sharp and knowledgeable about Earth Sciences. However, he is quite a dry lecturer and goes into GREAT detail about everything. Staying awake in lectures is difficult, but worth it. Tests are all VERY difficult. Brute memorization is key, however don't expect to do well on the exams. Try to make up your mark on the labs.
Best teacher I've had yet. Organized,concise, and incredibly knowledgeable.
